Hue (MohammadHossien) Salari

I am currently a doctoral researcher at the Interactive Technologies Lab at the University of Eastern Finland. I am working under the guidance of Prof. Roman Bednarik (University of Eastern Finland, Finland) and Prof. Dr. Anke Huckauf (Ulm University, Germany). I am deeply passionate about computer vision and edge AI technologies, as well as the development of cost-effective eye-trackers for everyday applications. Additionally, I am actively involved in the practical implementation and performance assessment of eye-tracking technology in real-world scenarios.
